text:
PERSONNEL FOR NAEB NETWORK SERIES
A
Captain 'Thomas L. Moore, Jr. (Announcer) -
A Philadelphian, Captain Moore has had many years of professional
broadcasting experience. In addition to being associated with the
CBS network for some time, he was also network supervisor of the
American Forces Network (AFN) in Europe. His responsibilities
included 27 American stations all over ftirope.
2Nd. Lieutenant Richard L. Spears (Producer) -
A Chicagoan by birth, a Cincinnatian by adoption, Lt. Spears has
been associated with WGN and the Mutual Broadcasting system in Chicago.
He was also associated with WLW and WLWT (TV) in Cincinnati. Lt.
Spears is the former general manager of the NAEB affiliate WMU$ at
Miami University (Ohio). His experience includes Morgan Beatty's
"News of the World" on NBC, NBC's "It Happens to You", John Cameron
Swayze's "News Caravan" and many other NBC and Mutual radio and
television shows*
